mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(c.cid) AS stationQuantity, SUM(c.tongXinBianMaGuiDaoNumber + c.tongXinBianMaZhanNeiOneGuiDaoNumber + c.jiDianOneToOneGuiDaoNumber + c.jiDianNToOneGuiDaoNumber + c.jiDianNToOneSheBeiNumber + c.tongXinBianMaDianMaHuaSheBeiNumber + c.jiDianNToOneDianMaHuaSheBeiNumber + c.jiDianJiaShiGuiDaoNumber) AS totalTrackQuduanQuantity, SUM(c.jiDianJiaShiDianMaHuaSheBeiNumber + c.jiDianDianMaHuaNumber) AS dianmahuaQuantity FROM mro_chezhan c WHERE c.xd_cz_id = #{xid,jdbcType=INTEGER}
